name: Karot
description:
The first board game of its kind is here, play against virtual opponent or play against a friend using a same device, Karot will certainly keep you entertained for hours!

Karot gives you the opportunity to discover the very fundamentals of what it takes to become a true board game master with a twist. Each card changes the odds and each card carries a fate of its own, either to guide you through your victory or waiting patiently for its last bad beat moment. Like a general with his Champions, each card is part of your army, each step you take will bring you closer to an exciting victory.

Online Game Mode is only available in Karot Online version
